    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the login screen, sets the text to the appropriate language
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The FXML location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • onLogin

      public void onLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      The onLogin method which manages the login functionality

      Each login attempt is tracked and logged in the login_activity.txt file

      Parameters:
      event - Login button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals an Input/Output exception has occurred
      SQLException - Signals an SQLException has occurred
